comment:
>>38430644

“The two of you have any other plans?” You ask.

“Not really.” Aelriss says, and Tatsumaki nods at her. “Not anymore.”

“Alright,” You respond. “Stay online for a bit and I'll let you know how things pan out.”

> [[ UI Messenger – Ayla ]]
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Sup
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( Not much. ))
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: That was a quick response. Busy?
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( Having a chat with the Alliance leaders at the Guardians' hall. ))
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( Evidently there's been a bit of a controversy. I've a feeling changes are on the horizon. ))
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Changes?
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( Don't worry about it. ))
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( You need something? ))
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Remember the Sanctum thing? I wanted to talk to you about the possibility of a joint expedition.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Judging by what we found down there last time, this place seems important.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: You said you wanted to bring one of your officers, right? I was thinking we could go in with two parties. You can bring a group of your guild members, or even others from the Alliance.
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( And you're bringing... an ambitious bunch of Guildless. ))
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: I mean.
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( :P Kidding. ))
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( I was already planning on taking a party of my own, to be honest. But it sounds like a good idea. I'll bring it up in a second. ))

You're idly meandering through the market square, and you've stalled near a player who's loitering by one of the stands, dressed like a witch with a tall red hat. You might have seen her doing crafting for people earlier, out of the corner of your eye.

“...Yes?” She says, as if you've intruded on her space. You -have- been here for a few seconds. “Speak your query, or be on your way.”

[[ 1 ]]
> “Sorry about that. Don't text and walk.”
> “That's no way to run a business. Can you do something with this bug heart?”

[[ 2 ]]
> Ask Ayla about the “controversy”.
> Other.
name: Sylvetica
